skills.title: Frontend
skills.description: Can work with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React and more. Has experience with UI/UX design and can create responsive web applications.

skills.title: Backend
skills.description: Can make real time applications, work with databases, and  use APIs to create dynamic web applications.

skills.title: Data Analysis
skills.description: Can work with data, clean it, analyze it, and visualize it. Has experience with Python, Pandas, Numpy, and more.

skills.title: Game Development
skills.description: Can create games using Unity, C#, and more. Has experience with 2D and 3D game development.

skills.title: Mobile Development
skills.description: Can create mobile applications using React Native, Android Studio, and more. Has experience with both Android and iOS development.

portfolio.title: Weather App
portfolio.description: An Android app developed in Java that shows the weather of a city using the OpenWeatherMap API. The app has a clean and simple UI and is easy to use. For more information, visit the Github page, where you can download the app for yourself.

portfolio.title: Chat App
portfolio.description: A chat application made using React and Firebase. The app has a clean and simple UI and is easy to use. For more information, visit the Github page. You can also view the app by clicking the button below.

portfolio.title: CS:CO
portfolio.description: A fun cat themed shootemup game made using Unity and C#. It was developed for a game jam. It is one of the many games I've developed. You can see more by visiting my itch.io page by clicking the button below.
